meanings.sent1: The ice cream was ultracold and made my teeth ache.
meanings.sent2: She shivered in the ultracold wind as she walked home.
meanings.sent3: The ultracold water in the pool turned everyone into penguins!
meanings.sent4: His ultracold stare sent shivers down her spine.
meanings.sent5: The ultracold metal bench felt like sitting on a block of ice.

meanings.definition: A state of being at a temperature close to absolute zero.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study ultracold to understand quantum mechanics better.
meanings.sent2: The lab equipment is designed to maintain ultracold conditions.
meanings.sent3: The ultracold in the freezer made the ice cream too hard to scoop!
meanings.sent4: In the ultracold of space, time seems to stand still.
meanings.sent5: The ultracold of the cryogenic chamber preserved the specimen perfectly.
